message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 16-6-1, translated into en
data:
Data availability:

Data Availability 2010 to present (in terms of how many countries have at least 1 data point after 2010 for this indicator)

Asia and Pacific: 23; Africa: 41; Latin America and Caribbean: 24; Europe, North America, Australia, New Zealand and Japan: 19

Data Availability 2000-2009:

Asia and Pacific: 28; Africa: 52; Latin America and Caribbean: 28; Europe, North America, Australia, New Zealand and Japan: 17

Time series:

Disaggregation:

This is an aggregate national level figure. However, subnational figures can be obtained for countries with decentralized government systems.
